posts.title: Grid type
posts.body:
At first glance of the names, it might seem like auto-fill and auto-fit are opposites. But in fact, the difference between is quite subtle.

Maybe it seems like you are getting extra space at the end of the column with auto-fit. But when and how?

Letâ€™s take a look at what is really happening under the hood.

posts.title: Copenhagen Fashion Week
posts.body:
The Sacramento typeface is a monoline, semi-connected script inspired by hand-lettering artist brochure work of the 1950's and 1960's. It stands on a thin line between formal and casual lettering styles, yet it has a commanding presence for headlines and titles.

Monoline, semi-connected script inspired by hand-lettering artist brochure work of the It stands on a thin line between formal and casual lettering styles, yet it has a commanding presence for headlines and titles.
